statements: SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_id, source_location, destination_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT destination_location, source_location FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_code, estimated_arrival_time, actual_arrival_time FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule WHERE estimated_arrival_time > '2022-01-01' AND actual_arrival_time IS NULL;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_code FROM shipment_schedule;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule WHERE estimated_arrival_time > NOW();
SELECT destination_location, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_schedule GROUP BY destination_location;
SELECT source_location, destination_location, estimated_arrival_time FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule WHERE source_location = 'Warehouse A' AND actual_arrival_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule;
SELECT shipment_id, arrival_time, departure_time FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, pickup_location, delivery_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE pickup_location = 'New York';
SELECT shipment_id, arrival_time, delivery_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, arrival_time, delivery_status FROM shipment_schedule JOIN delivery_timeline ON shipment_schedule.shipment_id = delivery_timeline.shipment_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule WHERE pickup_location = 'New York' AND arrival_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_location, arrival_time FROM shipment_schedule WHERE pick_location = 'Chicago' AND arrival_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule LEFT JOIN delivery_timeline ON shipment_schedule.shipment_id = delivery_timeline.shipment_id WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT delivery_location, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_schedule GROUP BY delivery_location ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT delivery_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE pickup_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY shipment_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, current_status FROM shipment_schedule WHERE current_status = 'In Transit';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, current_status FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, current_status FROM shipment_schedule WHERE current_status = 'Delayed' ORDER BY shipment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_timeline WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY shipment_date DESC, current_status ASC
SELECT shipment_id, estimated_delivery_date FROM shipment_schedule WHERE current_status='In Transit'
SELECT shipment_id, current_status FROM shipment_schedule WHERE estimated_delivery_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM delivery_timeline JOIN shipment_schedule ON delivery_timeline.shipment_id = shipment_schedule.shipment_id
SELECT shipment_id, dock_location FROM cross_docking_logistics ORDER BY estimated_processing_time DESC
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY shipment_date DESC, departure_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT shipment_id, from_location, to_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE from_location = 'New York';
SELECT arrival_time, departure_time FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT * FROM delivery_timeline WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT company_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM logistics_company ORDER BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, from_location, to_location FROM shipment_schedule WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM delivery_timeline WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_timeline ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM logistics_company WHERE company_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule;
SELECT id, arrival_date FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_timelines WHERE status='Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_timelines LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, country FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM shipment_schedule ORDER BY arrival_date DESC, departure_date ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, arrival_date, departure_date FROM shipment_schedule WHERE arrival_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery_timelines WHERE status = 'In Transit';
SELECT id, name, country FROM logistics_providers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE status LIKE '%Delayed%' ORDER BY shipment_id ASC, location_id DESC;
